title: Gaia, a platform to finance IVF treatments, closes $20M Series A led by Atomico - TechCrunch
content: Gaia, a platform to finance IVF treatments, closes $20M Series A led by Atomico  TechCrunch
description: Gaia is a startup that is effectively out to “de-risk” the whole process of IVF fertility treatment, using products like personalized insurance and payment plans. It’s almost BNPL for babies — but not quite. It’s now closed a $20 million Series A funding round led by London’s Atom…
